resources.string:
My name is Florencia and I'm 22 years old. I'm finishing the Computer Engineering program.

 When I was 19, I started to work as intern at Core Security (now it's Secureauth). Since then I haven't stopped learning and improving in the computer field. 

Outside of work, I like watching series and movies on Netflix and Disney +. Sometimes, I go out with my friends to have fun, we like playing board games.
 Also, when I have free time, I spend time on taking courses to learn new technologies. I strongly recommend websites such as Udemy, Codecademy and Udacity.

 I'm a big fan of travelling. My boyfriend and I have visited many places in our country - Argentina -, but we'd like to dive into the whole world.
